inclusion.criterion: Sample consists of 30 participants, divided into two groups.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participants will undergo a 4-week control period between the first and second evaluations.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnostic ultrasound will be used to measure the fat layer.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Bioelectrical impedance analysis (BIA) technique is based on the model of a cylindrical conductor with length and uniform and homogeneous cross-cutting area.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Evaluations shall be performed by a professional with training and experience in this type of analysis.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The Maltron BF-900 model unit will be used for the examination.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The protocol recommendations proposed by the European Society for Clinical Nutrition and Metabolism will be adopted.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participants will not change their respective routine activities during the study period.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The participants will undergo 12 sessions of individual radio frequency applications, twice a week, for a total of 6 weeks treatment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The fat thickness measurements are made with a linear probe (7.5 MHz) with a depth of 4 to 5cm.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The parameters used in this study have been previously tested and showed no health risk.
inclusion.label: met
